caption:
“Let nothing disturb you, let nothing frighten you.” — St. Teresa of Ávila

Reflection:
Fear fades where faith is fixed. The heart anchored in God cannot be shaken. Stillness becomes armor, peace becomes power.

Commentary:
This quote urges calm resilience — not denial of fear but trust beyond it. God’s constancy makes courage possible, even in uncertainty.
